#summary Apache Common Maths is a powerful open-source library embedded in GroovyLab. We demonstrate some examples.

= Examples =


== F - Distribution ==

{{{

// create an F-Distribution with degrees of freedom 2 and 4
fx  = new FDistribution(2, 4)

t = Inc(0,0.01,10)
N = t.length
x = new double[N]
// compute the cumulative distribution function
for (k in 0..N-1) 
  x[k] = fx.cumulativeProbability(t[k])
	

 plot(t, x, "F-Distribution")


}}}
